original_text: The officer in Judah said that they could not eat the priests' special food. They must wait until there was a leader of the priests who could use the Urim and Thummim to decide the right thing to do. 2: The Urim and Thummim were special stones. God used them to show the priests what he wanted. The officer in Judah said that they could not eat the priests' special food. korean_text: 방백이 그들에게 명령하여 우림과 둠밈을 가진 제사장이 일어나기 전에는 지성물을 먹지 말라 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: that they could not eat the priests' special food
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 제사장들의 특별한 음식을 먹을 수 없다고
